issue.title: Message to confirm an order should be specific
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Message to confirm an order should be specific.
It is :
COM_EASYSDI_SHOP_ITEM_SAVED_SUCCESSFULLY -> "Item saved successfully"

It should be something like "You order has been sent"



**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

It is now specific, and differentiated for order, draft, and estimate
rev. 8938
